name: mansion
story: You are in a mansion, and you are sitting in your study room thinking of an adventurous journey!
nav: press 1 to go to the waterfall, press 2 to go to the cinema and press 3 to go to the harbour

name: waterfall
story: You are at the waterfall, there are colourful fish in the lake. some people are  standing under the  water falls and drenching
nav: press 1 to go mansion, 2 to go to the cinema, or 3 to go to the hotel

name: harbour
story: You are at the harbour, admiring the different kinds of ships.
nav: Press 1 to go back mansion, press 2 to go to the north pole, and press 3 to go to the secret chamber

name: north pole
story: You are on the north pole admiring the  northern lights

name: hotel
story: You are at a luxorious hotel. You are feeling tired and need to rest

story: You are on the cinema watching the god father movie

story: you need a key to get to tessaract chest

story: You are on the fight club fighting the thugs

story: You are on skylab

story: You are at the Ocean, listening to the sound of tides and enjoying the breeze

name: circus
story: Your family memebers are missing and you need to find them

story: You are struggling to esacpe the thick smoke and heat
